scripts.ambassadorsite-devel: export NODE_ENV=development; export FUNCTION=ambassadorsite; nodemon --inspect src/index.js
scripts.ambassadorsite-remotedevel: export NODE_ENV=remotedevel; export FUNCTION=ambassadorsite; node src/index.js
scripts.ambassadorsite-prod: export NODE_ENV=production; export FUNCTION=ambassadorsite; node src/index.js
scripts.ambassadorsite-test: export NODE_ENV=unittest; export FUNCTION=ambassadorsite; mocha --recursive -c src/test
scripts.stocktracker-devel: export NODE_ENV=development; export FUNCTION=stocktracker; nodemon --inspect src/index.js
scripts.stocktracker-remotedevel: export NODE_ENV=remotedevel; export FUNCTION=stocktracker; node src/index.js
scripts.stocktracker-prod: export NODE_ENV=production; export FUNCTION=stocktracker; node src/index.js
scripts.stocktracker-test: export NODE_ENV=unittest; export FUNCTION=stocktracker; mocha --recursive -c src/test
